metadata.title: CVE-2018-6335 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Malformed h2 frame can cause 'std::out_of_range' exception when parsingpriority meta data. This behavior can lead to denial-of-service. Thisaffects all supported versions of HHVM (3.25.2, 3.24.6, and 3.21.10 andbelow) when using the proxygen server to handle HTTP2 requests.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
